name: Magnetic Nova
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You unleash a burst of magnetic electricity that violently flings away every creature within the area, moving them 60 feet directly away from you. If an affected creature has metal equipment, they must succeed on a Strength saving throw at the start of their turn to be able to move it. On a failure, they can't move that equipment during their turn and must repeat the saving throw each turn until they succeed. If a creature can't move their armor, they are considered to be restrained.

Creatures that collide with an object or another creature, or creatures that are struck by thrown creatures from this spell, must succeed on a Strength saving throw or take 8d6 bludgeoning damage, halved on a success. A creature can only take damage from this spell once.
empower: Choose one - reduce the cost to 1 AP, or range is increased to 60 feet.
